title: Help with figuring out fonts for Forum website
content: What do you guys think of PT Sans for a forum community. I'm using it right now at [https://www.physicsforums.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160444/https:/www.physicsforums.com/ "https://www.physicsforums.com") and I really like it for UI/Nav but I was playing with Georgia for post content. Would they work well together? Is PT Sans good enough for post content? Thanks!!
author: dethfire
